list-item.p: O. vulgare is anti-candidal in nature against oral isolates of Candida in CADS
Antifungal effect of essential oil obtained through hydrodistillation is more than the effects of extracts obtained through maceration
MIC and MFC of O. vulgare for oral Candida are 0.024% and 0.097%, respectively, and were much lower than that of fluconazole
The major functional unit in O. vulgare is similar to carvacrol, which is a proven antifungal compound.
